name: Tako Nom Nom
description:
You are a little blue jellyfish who is stuck spinning clockwise. tap to thrust in the direction you are facing to collect fish and feed the never ending hunger of the tako before it gets hangry

Controls: space-bar, or click!

Game by: @britt_t_brady
SFX by: @mafgar_online

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/tako-nom-nom
